user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot displays a search results page on Amazon for "MacBook Air." The user has applied a filter for RAM size, with options for 4GB, 6GB, and 8GB. The results show various models of MacBook Air with their prices, star ratings, and key features, such as the 2020 model with an M1 chip priced at $967.50, along with stock availability and delivery options to the Netherlands.
